title: 3 days and no replay from support GG
body: 3 days and we are waiting for riot support to replay uss and why ! because we got banned acc for no reason at all no hack no flame no nothing and they did not replay uss !! so i think they want to ban uss because we  buy rp on it !! this is why ! if this is why tell uss and we know wath we can do we work on this acc for 3 years 3 years of hard work to get it to gold and 120 champ and i comme to home found my acc baned i sent to riot 3 days no replay and im waiting and waiting im done like this

replies.body:
Turnaround times for replies can vary depending on how many tickets that team has and the complexity of the issues they're tackling at the time. I recommend continuing to be patient while they get back to you while avoiding replying or "bumping" your ticket before a specialist gets back to you. When you bump your ticket, it gets sent to the back of the queue and lengthens the time it takes for someone to get back to you. 

Let me know if you have any questions.
